articles.title: Vitamin B12 deficiency can lead to brain shrinkage; this and other facts on vitamins and brain health - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: ​A study published in the print issue of Neurology, the medical journal of the American Academy of Neurology had found that older people with low vitamin B12 are likely to experience brain shrinkage due to loss of brain cells. MRI scans of the participants in…
articles.content:
A better cognitive health is the need of the hour. The World Health Organisation (WHO) says currently more than 55 million people are living with dementia.
A Lancet study has estimated that by 2050 … [+490 chars]
